name: 蓮
message: "Aoba, behind you."
I spin around to see one of those dog Allmates standing there.
If it hits me with that beam, I'm done for!
I take off running down the hall, the pain in my side forgotten.
I hear the dog's footsteps coming after me.
Need... somewhere to hide...!
I dash frantically down the hall. There! An elevator!
I throw myself at the door and smash the call button.
Hurry... Hurry...!
The door opens and I jump inside.
The last thing I see before the door closes is the Allmate's jaws open wide.
I'm safe...
I press the button for the top floor.
After a short trip, the elevator stops and the door starts to open.
But just as I'm about to step out... I freeze.
Another one.
And this time, its mouth is already open, the barrel of its gun pointed straight at me.
What do I do?!
A memory flashes through my head.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Hngh!"
Just before it fires, I throw the cube Noiz gave me straight into the dog's mouth.
I hear a muffled explosion, and then the dog takes a few steps back, legs twitching.
It struggles for a bit, smoke pouring from its mouth, but eventually it collapses.
...Did it work?
I approach the dog to see.
Yeah. It looks dead.
Noiz's cube is on the floor next to it. Its eye lights are blinking.
When I pick it up, it starts talking.

name: ウサギモドキ
message: "...Unit 24, abnormal readings... Severing connection..."
Looks like it broke when the beam discharged....

name: ウサギモドキ
message: "...Noiz... is near... Unit 58..."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Noiz? He's here? Where?"

name: ウサギモドキ
message: "This level... large room... in the middle... 83, deteriorating..."
As I watch, the lights in its eyes dim, then go dark. It used the last of its energy to deliver its message.

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Thanks. I'm gonna find Noiz."
I put the cube into my jacket pocket, then slip past the dog Allmate and head down the hallway.
Noiz is in a large room in the middle of this floor...
I have to hurry.
My side still hurts, but I have more pressing concerns.
After walking for a bit, I reach a door at the end of the hallway. It's much more elaborate than the others.
Is this the place?
I run up to the door.
